gui.colytra.config.itemListType.name: Chestplate items list type
gui.colytra.config.itemListType.tooltip: Determines if itemsList contains allowed items or denied items.
gui.colytra.config.itemsList.name: Chestplate items
gui.colytra.config.itemsList.description: The items for crafting with elytras.
gui.colytra.config.fusionType.name: Crafting fusion type
gui.colytra.config.fusionType.descriptio:
Determines how the combined elytra chestplates will behave.
NORMAL: Elytras will exist separately from the chestplate, able to be separated later.
UNISON: Elytras will fuse completely with the chestplate, unable to be separated.
PERFECT: Elytras will fuse completely with the chestplate and flying will not use durability.
gui.colytra.config.energyCost.name: Fall flying energy cost
gui.colytra.config.energyCost.descriptio: The energy cost per second of fall flying if fusionType is UNISON and the chestplate uses energy.
